;road orthogonalxdiagonal intersection, diagonal monorail ~ in order to build monorail overhead whole junction, road junctions need to be kept seperate. i.e. not dragged through orthogonally.
;1a
TYPE1=0x02030100,0x03010000,0x5FD72000,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010002,0x01000003,0x5FD72000,1,0
TYPE3=0x01000203,0x00000301,0x5FD72000,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020301,0x00030100,0x5FD72000,3,0
TYPE5=0x01020003,0x03010000,0x5FD72000,1,1
TYPE6=0x03010200,0x00030100,0x5FD72000,2,1
TYPE7=0x00030102,0x00000301,0x5FD72000,3,1
TYPE8=0x02000301,0x01000003,0x5FD72000,0,1
;1b
TYPE1=0x02030100,0x00000301,0x5FD72100,0,0
TYPE2=0x03010002,0x00030100,0x5FD72100,1,0
TYPE3=0x01000203,0x03010000,0x5FD72100,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020301,0x01000003,0x5FD72100,3,0
TYPE5=0x02000301,0x00030100,0x5FD72100,0,1
TYPE6=0x03010200,0x01000003,0x5FD72100,2,1
TYPE7=0x01020003,0x00000301,0x5FD72100,1,1
TYPE8=0x00030102,0x03010000,0x5FD72100,3,1
;1c orthogonal extra ~ to allow orthogonal drawing right through the junction once monorail has been built overhead
TYPE1a=0x02000203,0x03010000,0x5FD72100,2,0
TYPE1b=0x02030200,0x00000301,0x5FD72100,0,0
TYPE2a=0x00020302,0x01000003,0x5FD72100,3,0
TYPE2b=0x03020002,0x00030100,0x5FD72100,1,0

TYPE4a=0x02000201,0x00030100,0x5FD72100,0,1
